enterConferenceNameOrUrl: Enter a name for your SecurVid meeting or the full SecurVid URL
recentListLabel: or rejoin one of your recent conference rooms

onboarding.letUsShowYouAround: Take a tour of the SecurVid Desktop App!
onboarding.conferenceUrl: Enter the name (or full URL) of the room you want to join. You may make a name up, just let others know so they enter the same name.
onboarding.settingsDrawerButton: Click here to open the settings drawer.
onboarding.serverSetting: This will be the server where your conferences will take place.
onboarding.serverTimeout: Timeout to join a meeting, if the meeting hasn't been joined before the timeout hits, it's cancelled.
onboarding.alwaysOnTop: You can toggle whether you want to enable the "always-on-top" window, which is displayed when the main window loses focus. This will be applied to all conferences.
